      • getRootAncestor

        io.sphere.sdk.categories.Category getRootAncestor(io.sphere.sdk.categories.Category category)
        Gets the ancestor of the given category that is in root level.
        Parameters:
        category - the category which to find the root ancestor
        Returns:
        the root ancestor of the category or the same category in case it is a root itself
